title.narrative: Women in decision-making roles within WUAs (President, Vice President, Secretary, and Treasurer)
Area provided with new/improved irrigation or drainage services
Women's representation in WUAs or other village-level water committees
Area with reduction in water consumption
People benefitting from demand-side measures(of which women)
Blocks that show reduction in stage of groundwater development
Blocks with arrest in the rate of decline of groundwater levels
GPs which have adopted participatory groundwater management
GPs with Community-led WSPs prepared and approved
Wells with functioning meters for monitoring groundwater level (observation wells), volumetric water use, or energy use
Blocks with online groundwater quality and water-level monitoring reports made publicly available
States with improved groundwater monitoring and disclosure of groundwater data
WUAs or other village-level committees established and functioning
